Uses of Package

  • Classes in <Unnamed> used by <Unnamed> 
    Class Description
    Bet
    Bet is a class that extends the Type class, it adds a new variable named betPoints and is used to change the points correctly for this type of game.
    Game
    Game is the class that controls the logical aspects of the game.
    HighScore
    Class HighScore is the manager of the totalwins.dat and highscores.dat files which store the info for the total scores of every game in the two player mode game and the 10 best scores in the one player mode game.
    Player
    This class represents a player and it stores necessary information about their identity, answers and overall actions when playing the game.
    PlayersWallet
    This class represents a players wallet, it contains variables and methods that are used in special type of rounds.
    Questions
    This class represents a question that will be used in the game, it has four possible answers from which one is correct and belongs to a category.
    QuickAnswer  
    RightAnswer
    This class extends Type and adds 1000 points to every player that answers correctly.
    Round
    Round class selects Randomly one type of game from the following available choices (Thermometer, StopTheTimer RightAnswer, Bet, QuickAnswer)
    StopTheTimer
    StopTheTimer class extends Type class and represent the stop the timer type of game.
    Thermometer
    Thermometer extends Type, and it stores the information needed for scoring this type of round.
    Type
    Type class is and abstract class that represents the type of games.
